title: Adikavi Nannaya University Admission 2024: Courses, Fees, Eligibility Criteria
meta_description: Adikavi Nannaya University, Rajahmundhry, Andhra Pradesh. Admission News for

Expired Events.Events: Application Timeline (With Late fee of Rs 5000) [M.Tech]
Application Timeline (With Late fee of Rs 2000) [M.Tech]

faqs.question: Is Adikavi Nannaya University recognized?
faqs.answer: Ans:Adikavi Nannaya University is recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE).

faqs.question: Which colleges are there in Adikavi Nannaya University?
faqs.answer: Ans.It consists of 4 Colleges:-College of Arts and CommerceCollege of Science & TechnologyCollege of EngineeringCollege of Education.

faqs.question: Are there any scholarships available in the College?
faqs.answer: Ans:Residential Scholarships can be availed by fulfilling the condition of 75% minimum college attendance. However, it is available for Reserved Students only.

faqs.question: How can we apply for Admissions?
faqs.answer: Ans.By filling up the Online Admission Form. To download the formclick here

faqs.question: How is the placement Scenario of the University?
faqs.answer: Ans.It has recruiters from leading brands like IBM, Amazon, Infosys, Wipro, etc. The highest salary offered was ₹ 3.6 LPA.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for AKNU MBA Admission 2021?
faqs.answer: Ans.To get admission to the AKNU MBA course, a candidate must pass the AP - ICET examination and participate in the counselling process. One can also get admission into the MBA program through CAT/ MAT/ XAT scores.

faqs.question: What is the course fee for the M.P.Ed program offered at AKNU?
faqs.answer: Ans.AKNU charges INR 23,425 for the first year of M.P.Ed program. This amount includes the examination fee and tuition fees.

faqs.question: What specializations are offered in the B.Tech program at AKNU?
faqs.answer: Ans.AKNU also offers B.Tech Course in Computer Science, Electronics & Communication, Mechanical, and Civil specialization. Admissions are made on the basis of AP-EAMCET Score.

faqs.question: What is the basic eligibility for the admission 2024 in B.Tech program at AKNU?
faqs.answer: Ans.AKNU accepts B.Tech applications from intermediate who pass with 50% marks (45% marks for Reserved Category Students) from a recognized Board with PCM background in Science Stream for admission 2021.

faqs.question: What specializations are offered in MBA admission at AKNU?
faqs.answer: Ans.AKNU offers MBA Courses in Financial Management, Market Management, Human Resource Management, Tourism & Hospitality Management. Admissions are made on the basis of marks scored by the students in AP-ICET/CAT/XAT/MAT exam.

faqs.question: How does the AKNU entrance exam scores work in the Admission 2024 process?
faqs.answer: Ans.After the declaration of result and the rank of the candidates is determined, the AKNU admission 2024 process will be conducted based on the rank received by all candidates.

faqs.question: For what courses is Nannaya University Common Entrance Test conducted by AKNU?
faqs.answer: Ans.Nannaya University Common Entrance Test is conducted to get admission in M.Sc., M.Com., M.A.,M.Ed., M.P.Ed and MHRM programs offered at AKNU and other affiliated colleges in India.
